.. _Mesh_Objects_API:

Mesh Objects
============

Module containing classes and methods for mesh sizing creation, reading, writing and general manipulation.

    :members:
    :show-inheritance:
    :undoc-members:
    :private-members:
    :exclude-members: __weakref__, __dict__ 
    :special-members: __init__
    :autosummary:
